Source: Die Amerikaner schätzen diese ebenso wie jede andere - daher der sorgsam inszenierte Sturz Saddam Husseins auf dem Firdos Platz in Bagdad im Jahr 2003.
Reference: Americans appreciate this as well as anyone - hence the carefully stage-manged toppling of Saddam Hussein in Firdos square in Baghdad in 2003.
Translation:
The Americans value this just as much as any other - hence the carefully staged fall of Saddam Hussein in Firdos Square in Baghdad in 2003. 


**Explanation:**

* **"Die Amerikaner schätzen diese ebenso wie jede andere"** means "The Americans value this just as much as any other."  "Diese" refers to the act of removing a dictator, which is implied in the context.
* **"daher der sorgsam inszenierte Sturz Saddam Husseins auf dem Firdos Platz in Bagdad im Jahr 2003"** means "hence the carefully staged fall of Saddam Hussein in Firdos Square in Baghdad in 2003."  

The sentence implies that the US government orchestrated the fall of Saddam Hussein as a symbolic victory and a way to project an image of strength and success.
